name: Hold Out (itch) (c-dante)
description:
First attempt at a game in Godot, and first game in a looooooong (10 years?) time.

  • W/A/S/D to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • left click to shoot
  • Q / E to rotate the camera
  • Shift to sprint

Survive waves of enemies while mining resources for upgrades.

This draft was done from scratch over a 3 day weekend for the Stop Waiting for Godot jam #stopwaitingforgodot #SWFG
